1113.content: Is it some of these?
1113.title: Some other race.

11133221.content: Are you sure it's a pandaren?
11133221.title: Pandaren or...?

1121.content: Human! The most common of all the races in Azeroth! In fact, you need to choose where you're from as well!
1121.title: Human

11212.content: Are you a soldier or a civilian?
11212.title: Stormwind

112121.content:
You're a soldier! A proud member of the Stormwind army, ready to do your part in order to protect your king, kingdom and anything it stands for! Glory and honor awaits you!
That's what they told you before they sent you on this mission to scout a Horde camp. You've been sitting in the head of the Barrens for weeks now, struggling to sleep in your little tent as you kicked your sweaty legs around, both the hot air and fear of being discovered keeping you awake. You've heard of what they do to prisoners, after all...

One night though, while you were almost asleep, you opened your eyes wide as you heard something moving outside. Multiple footsteps, whispering... Your tent had been found. In terror, you froze still, hoping that they'd just leave you alone. However, this seemed hopeless. Judging from voices, there was a whole unit of Horde here; women, men, orcs, trolls, goblins... Closing your eyes, you just felt like wetting yourself.

Then, you opened them again. You can't do this. You're the best that Stormwind has to offer! One human matches one hundred orcs after all! Or, that's what they told you at the bootcamp at least. Grabbing your one-handed sword, you got up from your blanket and charged outside, wearing nothing but a rag around your waist. "FOR THE ALLI-" was all that could be heard of your mighty warcry before something knocked you out cold.

Next time you opened your eyes, first thing you realized was that your only rag had been stripped off, revealing your member. "Huh, wha..?" In confusion, you tried to move your hands to cover yourself up, only to then find yourself cuffed to the wall, your hands against the wall above your head, leaving you sitting on the ground helplessly. "HELP! SOMEONE!?" You shouted, but no answer was heard. Until someone walked in... you could hear them talking... it was...
112121.title: Soldier

1121211.content: You could heard a females voice. As the creature stepped in the dark dungeon, you saw ...
1121211.title: Female

1121212.content: You could heard a males voice. As the creature stepped in the dark dungeon, you saw ...
1121212.title: Male

11212122.content: Your eyes widened with fear as you saw...
11212122.title: something else

choices: The vast plains of the Barrens
112121222.content:
Heavy steps paired with the rustling of heavy plate armor announced the arrival of a hulking tauren. The beast itself looked muscular by default, the ornate armor only adding to its imposing presence. You shiver as he locks eyes with you and approaches. The tauren takes off his gloves and helmet, placing them on a nearby table. A calm smile adorned his face as he walked right up to you.

"The others told me you charged out by yourself against at least a hundred of us. That's brave. Resilient even. I like my captives... resilient." He cracked his knuckles, maintaining that same smile. You didn't think tauren would be capable of this sort of interrogation, but you were ready to spill the beans before he spilled your guts. The giant axe on his back was almost as big as you. You'd heard stories of tauren cleaving their opponents in half in one swing, but only now did you see that those stories were underselling the truth by a large margin. Your captor seemed to notice you staring at his weapon and pulled it from his back.

"Oh, don't be afraid, I'm not gonna use this. Just chopping you up would be far too quick, no fun at all. Let's see if you have some potential in those puny human bones." He set the axe aside and as you were about to ask him what he was talking about he drove a large fist into your gut. He stood back and pinned you against the wall, his open hand pressed against your chest. He felt your heartbeat racing and your swallow breaths. With minimal effort he leaned in until you screamed in pain, causing him to laugh.

"You and I are going to have some fun together. But not here in this stuffy dungeon. Let's take you someplace... nicer." With those words he threw a punch at your head, knocking you out once more. When you came to the first thing you felt was the binding still present around your wrists. You look around. Where did the tauren take you?
112121222.title: A tauren

choices: For the Alliance! You charge in heroically
You grab his knife and charge him
1121212222.content:
You knew these dry grasslands well. You were back in the Barrens. Desolate and rugged terrain as far as the eye could see. Only the hardiest of wildlife survived out here. You grab your head, feeling a small welt from the tauren's blow. You look down and see a big bruise where he punched you in the gut. Your haziness was scattered by a piercing scream. It sounded human. You looked around and saw the tauren, clad only in some rough cloth pants, wrestling with another human. He looked to be a prisoner like yourself, stripped down to nothing and desperately holding on against his much larger opponent. He'd just received a nasty hit to the gut, yelling out in pain. The tauren just smiled. You could see him sweating, but you doubt it was from the fight. The heat in the Barrens was unrelenting. You had been given the small mercy of being left in the shade of a tree. When the large bull sees you stirring, he pauses his fight to talk to you.

"You're up. Finally. Don't go anywhere, I'm almost done 'interrogating' your friend." You raise an eyebrow with curiosity. He was doing what now? "Oh, don't look so surprised. Nobody even tell you how tauren interrogate someone? We wrestle them into submission and squeeze the answers out of them. Literally if need be. Your friend here is tough, but even he told me about your camp." He turned to the panting human. His body was covered in bruises. "You got anything more to add to that?"

The haggard man shook his head. He'd been beaten half to death by this monster. Between the heavy blows and blistering heat, he didn't have the wits to do anything other than obey. He cracked a wry smile when the tauren congratulated him on helping the Horde. His grin slowly faded as the beast walked up to him.

"Now normally I'd leave you here with nothing so you can try and claw your way towards freedom. But I'm afraid we've got orders not to do that anymore." Before the man realized what this meant the tauren wrapped his arms around him, lifting him off the ground. Your eyes grew wide in horror as the hulking beast began to apply a spineshattering bearhug to his helpless victim. The man cried out for mercy before screaming in agony. The tauren was undeterred, simply putting on more pressure as he squeezed the puny human in his arms. As he neared the man's breaking point his smile grew bigger. His mighty muscles strained and with a sickening wet crunch the man's screams fell silent. Sputtering and gurgling was all that was left for him as the insatiable brute just kept on squeezing. To your horror the tauren manages to draw several more crunches from the human's body before discarding it.

"He's for the vultures. Now it's your turn." He spoke calmly, seemingly oblivious to the man he just crushed to death with his bare hands. He picked up a small knife from his pile of gear and used it to cut through your bindings. Before you got up he held you down.

"If you run I'll break every bone in your body and make sure you're awake to feel all of it. You were brave enough to charge a hundred of us, so I don't want to see any cowardice against just me. If you tell me everything I might even be tempted to ignore my orders and let you go. Whether you're still healthy enough to crawl to safety at that point is up to you. Now on your feet." You slowly get up, your legs still unsteady after days of captivity. The tauren was ready to wrestle, beckoning you to come closer and show him your might. A glint catches your eye. At your feet was his knife. He'd forgotten to stash it after cutting your bindings. It could give you the advantage you need to overcome the tauren, but he would not go easy on you if your plan backfired.
1121212222.title: The vast plains of the Barrens

choices: You spill every secret you have
You try to headbutt the tauren in the junk
11212122221.content:
You psych yourself up as much as possible in your situation with a valiant warcry. The tauren raises a curious eyebrow. Were you really going to...

"For the Alliance!" You roar, jumping onto your feet and charging towards him. In spite of his ready stance he seems caught off guard by your bravado, but it doesn't take long for reality to bring you back down. As you charge into him it felt like you'd just slammed into a wall. And now it was the wall's turn to make a move. Two large hands found their way around your waist and your ferocious push was halted when he simply lifted you off your feet.

With a low grunt the tauren let himself drop backwards, giving him the added momentum he needed to launch you through the air. You were given a sample of the beast's strength as you soared higher than you thought possible before landing painfully in the warm, dry grass. You were going to feel that free sample of flight in the morning, assuming you'd live long enough to see another morning. As you try to compose yourself the bull-man had gotten up and was slowly walking over to you.

"I'm impressed. Most of you try the knife. Maybe there's some scraps of honor in there after all. Granted, it'll take more than a knife to even the odds, but that clever little grin you humans get when you think you've outsmarted me... Oh, I love wiping that smirk off their faces." He grinned broadly and picked up the pace, bursting into a sprint before leaping up and preparing a ferocious elbow drop. You roll out of the way at the last moment, trying not to think about how much that would've hurt. The heavy thump produced by the tauren hitting the ground next to you a stark reminder of the brute's advantage in strength. You had to come up with something or this monster would simply wear you down.

Instead of getting on his feet, the tauren simply raised an arm and brought it down on your body. The heavy impact in your sides made your whole body twitch, pain radiating throughout. It provided your enemy the time to get back up, looming over you menacingly. You felt a large hand grab your leg and lift you up. Soon you were hoisted high enough to be eye to eye with the tauren's rough leather boxers. The stench was unpleasant, but it was nothing compared to what the beast did next.

His free arm wrapped around you, pressing your body tightly against his rock-hard abs. The short, bristly fur covering it providing an extra layer of discomfort. He let go of your leg and held you with both arms, squeezing a little before jumping up. You looked down to see the arid landscape approaching fast before colliding with it in the tauren's merciless piledriver. The blow dazed you, making it hard to keep track of what your tormentor was doing.

The tauren looked down, seeing his captive's eyes glazed over. The man was staring at his junk. "Hmmm, you like what you're seeing?" He taunted before bringing his thighs together to pin the man's face into his groin. He let the human stew in his powerful musk for a little while before getting back up on his feet. His grip was tight as ever and though this had been fun, it was time to actually do some interrogating.

"You've had a sample of what'll happen if I'm not happy with what I'm hearing. Now's your chance to avoid more of it happening. Talk, puny man. Tell me everything."
11212122221.title: For the Alliance! You charge in heroically

choices: Was it one of the undead?
112121223.content: What else could it be?
112121223.title: something else

choices: Go take care of the farm
1121221.content:
You're just a regular farmer in the outer parts of Elwynn forest, owning a small pumpkin field, with some pigs, cows and a horse. Life is hard work, but you manage to still have some spare time here and there. Unfortunately, being a bit secluded from Goldshire and rest of the citizens, you are a bit vulnerable. You've had some bad encounters with murlocs in the nearby lake. Gnolls have vandalized your property from time to time. Wolves, bears and other beasts wander around the forest and on top of that you may never know for sure whether there is a Horde spy lurking somewhere. In all honesty, the dangers, while relatively low compared to much of the other areas in Azeroth, are still quite diverse and you may never really know for sure what you'll run into.
Well, at least the undead and demons are quite a rare sight around here.


How are you spending your day?
1121221.title: Farmer

choices: Get knocked out by something and wake up somewhere
11212212.content:
You're feeling like getting some meat for today's menu. You grab your rifle, some bread, water and head on to the woods.
Things are going well for awhile, boring even, when you suddenly hear a noise in the bushes. You lift your gun up and aim. What do you do?
11212212.title: Go hunting

112122123.content:
You barely managed to take a step forth when everything suddenly went black.

It felt as if a mere moment had passed, as you woke up with a slight headache. However, after regaining your consciousness, you realize that it's in fact the night. By the smell you can tell that you're near your stalls and trying to get up you realize that you're tied up, seemingly in middle of your field.
You can't really cry for help, as you find yourself gagged with a cloth tasting bit similar to sweat...

You hear something walk towards you. You turn your head and see...
112122123.title: Get knocked out by something and wake up somewhere

11212231.content:
"A wrong choice of profession" is all you can think of, as the sun hits your eyes; you're in a pillory, wearing nothing but your undergarments, your head and hands stuck tightly as your sight gets used to the light after having the bag removed from your head, which you had been wearing for the last twenty minutes.

Luckily, it wasn't too cold or hot that day. Despite being almost naked, the elements weren't too harsh for you. However, that was the last of your worries now. As your eyes get used to the daylight, you start seeing the people around you, some stopping to watch you, the crowd slowly growing and growing. You quickly realize that you're in the trade district of Stormwind, the busiest district of them all. You were caught awhile ago in Westfall, having been a wanted thief. You just had no idea that you had been transferred the capital city, as you had been knocked out most of the trip and wore a bag over your face rest of the time.

Well, here you were, naked, helpless and quickly being surrounded by the populace that most likely did not think too fondly of you.
As you were still waking your eyes up properly, you really snapped out of it when suddenly your face was hit with a rather soft tomato, spreading all over the place as the crowd laughed.
You didn't even see any guards around you... you are now under the crowds mercy. Amidst all the shouting, mocking and laughing, you hear something that caught your attention. What was it?
11212231.title: A caught thief

1123.content: Are you some of these?
1123.title: More races.

1123322.title: Pandaren.

1211.content: You were born into the horde and have since lived your life as any orc girl should or at least as you think you should act as an orc though it is rather hard to get an idea of if it's right. You lived in a mostly sheltered home having your father tell you tales of great warriors and how to properly use an axe and how to cook while your mother chose to teach you how to control the bloodlust within you as well as how to teach the other young pups who think they deserve you to stay away unless you want them closer. Yet despite all that you had learned under them you have yet to apply it until now as you have finally become apart of the clan though many seem to be wary of you for one reason or another. Maybe it was that your parent's chose to live outside the settlement or maybe it was that you only recently discovered that only your parents, the shaman and the clan leader knew about your existence or maybe it was simply that now a women you chose to turn your attention to different pursuits than what your parents would have had you follow. Is that perhaps what has happened?
1211.title: Orc

choices: I enjoy it. Though I can think of something else for one of em.
12111.content: And it is as a warrior that you make your preparations to go on your first mission for the Horde trying to make sure your blade is as sharp as your body is ready before flinging the massive great sword onto your back and turning towards the duty roster trying to decide which assignment you might take though it was rather difficult with all the eyes leering over at you. Not a single man even trying to hide his gaze as they wander over your strong curvaceous and buxom form, each of them smirking and chuckling quietly challenging one another to see who will try to get to know this pup. You scratch the back of your head trying to keep focused on the task at hand as this was the first opportunity you've ever to prove yourself and can't afford to be distracted by a few young pups in the same situation as you. That being said though how do you feel about all this attention?
12111.title: No, I am a warrior as my mother and father befo...

choices: An amazon? This might actually be worth my time!
Magic against might...I'll show that demoness who's in charge!
121112.content: Honestly it's for the best, the years you've spent training and though you've never actually been part of a battle you know somewhere in the back of your mind that there isn't a single one of these whelps that could handle you and besides you've a task to so you've little time for the pursuits of the heart at least right now. That may change some day but for now you only wish to prove yourself to the clan and bring honor onto your name through battle, blood, and victory. That being said your attention turns back to the board without delay and it seems that there are more than a few task that require the immediate attention of a sharp blade as well as the strong sword arm that wields her. The first posting seems to speak of some sort of Amazon wandering about the lands brutalizing and slaying any who dare to cross her path though beyond that there is little else to go on other than she can be recognized by the fact that she is human with the physique of a female orc yet is human in appearance and beside that one there seems to be a masterless Succubus living in a nearby ravine causing all manor of trouble from taking food from traveling merchants, devouring your fellow warriors as well as a rather large laundry list of other deeds so the question is of these two beast...who will you face?
121112.title: Truth be told...I prefer woman.

choices: Go out and try to find a way out?
Stay put. You don't know what's out there.
1221.content:
You blink your eyes and the first thing you notice is iron bars of a cage surrounding you. You're inside of a orcish hut, shut in a cage.
Only thing you remember is being sent on a sneaking mission from the Stormwind, to gain information about to orcish movements, then the rest is just forgotten. All you have on you is a rag around your waist and broken cuffs around your wrists.
After waking up properly and giving your surroundings a look around, you notice that your cage is actually unlocked.

Will you...
1221.title: Orc

1223321.content:
Being a member of the Goblins of the Horde is not the easier job. Like your counterparts in the Alliance, you on the small side, a race of tinkers and inventors. If there's anyone who going to be dominated or humulated it's you. Naturally, you're are prepared for anything or you hope anyway.

Before we get started, what is your gender?
1223321.title: Goblin!

choices: She didn't ask you here for that.
12233211.content:
You work hard days every day at the local trike company in Kezan, building the trikes at the machinery side, constantly getting dirty and hurt. The payment ain't too good and you gotta lick boots every day to keep even this crappy job. That's what you get for not going to school.
Your boss, Miss Goldbottom, ain't known for thinking high of the working class, treating you like animals, while she walks around in her shiny boots and pretty suit, watching all of you work up from her office window, where she has a total control of the factory and a total freedom to bully all of you by setting the air conditioning off, making the assembly line go at astronomical speed, or whatever she thought of. If there wasn't a button for something there, she had it installed.

So, yeah. Your boss is a total bitch who doesn't like the stinky workers at the assembling side. That's why you were in disbelief and a little scared when you were ordered to her office by one of her hobgoblin thugs. Nervously you try to wipe the black dirt off your hands as you walk up the stairs leading to her office. The walls are decorated with all sorts of pretty paintings and the doorway is absolutely over-sized. You step in carefully and take a look around. There's the empty red chair in front of you, her desk ( with her collection of buttons ), the window to your working area and there by the window she is standing, her wide behind facing towards you, her short, blonde hair combed back and shining in the light from the excess amount of oil on it and her big feet squeezed into pair of high heels, which look like they're made from freaking rubies.

You cough softly to signal your presence to her and she quickly turns her head to look at you over her shoulder. You haven't seen her this close before, but she looks just like you imagined her; a big, snobby nose pointing up, large drawn eyebrows, ridiculously thick layer of red lipstick and just generally very, very, very bitchy...

She looks at you and gets a devilish smirk on her face,

Are you in trouble?
12233211.title: Working hard

1223322.content: Are you a pandaren? This is the last race in Horde.
1223322.title: Pandaren?

123.content: How about a couple of any horde race dominate you?
123.title: A Horde Couple?

123131.content:
Your name is Bud Ashton, a human rogue not in a good position at the moment due to being locked in a cage with no lock picks or gear! You were caught trying to steal from one of the male Goblin auctioneers and ended up where you are now because of it. To make it worse, you've been locked up outside and haven't eaten in over 12 hours along with gaining a painful sunburn.
After hours it seems, a rather attractive Goblin female approaches you as you sat in your cage. Her name was Izzisal Copperpocket. Her skin like any other Goblin was green, very plush green lips, brown hair swept to the side and not to mention her well developed breasts and booty. "You piece of shit" she greets you with, clearly not happy, "I outta shank you for trying to steal from husband! Boss says I gotta feed ya but..." "But what!?" you shout as you jump up, feeling like your starving to death.
Izzisal smirks as she takes a bite of a dry piece of bread, which was clearly suppost to be yours. "Since you fucked around with me and my husband and ruining our day I'm gonna ruin yours!", "By starving me to death you little bitch!?" you reply, pissed the little Goblin was out of your reach. "Even worse you pathetic human" She replies as she turns around and place her hands on her wide hips. "If you wanna eat you gotta kiss my big green ass!" Izzisal speaks. Your heart nearly stopped and your anger rose even further. There was NO WAY you were gonna kiss the ass of your enemy and not to mention a Goblin!
Speechless you just couldn't speak nor think due to the pain of hunger, but as you remained silent Izzisal began to bend over slightly and moved towards you. "What'll it be?" She smirks as she pulls down her black leather pants enough to reveal some of her green butt cheeks. As painful as it was, you almost shed a tear for your pride as you finally dropped to your knees and smooched the sweaty green surface of her butt cheeks. Giggling away, Izzisal tosses the dry bread into your cage and leaves, whispering "I'll be back" before she left your sight.
You never felt so humiliated in your life, but it awarded you with some very funny tasting bread, that seemed to make you pass out within minutes of finishing it.
123131.title: Goblin couple

choices: 1 inch tall before Izzisal and her husband
half the height of Izzisal before her and her husband
1231311.content: With your head pounding, you awoke with a start to find yourself...
1231311.title: You wake up Shrunk!

12313111.content:
Slowly with your vision returning, you feel satisfied that your head finally stopped pounding after being drugged. Moaning in pain from your aching bones you finally bring yourself to stand and examine your surroundings only to find circular fleshy green walls on all sides around you. Unsure what they were, you REALLY wish you didn't as you looked up only to find yourself in the most terrifying situation you've ever been in!
Looking up you realize the fleshing walls are... green toes... and as they surround you, you hurt your sore neck to look up as far as you can to see a COLOSSAL Izzisal looking down at you before her toes and the Goblin male you tried to rob earlier's toes which must be her husband. Looking down again, one toe alone is ALOT bigger than you, making you realize how insignificant you are to them now.
"Well Well Well look who's awake!" Boomed the mega sized Izzisal. "You had alot of nerve trying to take my shit, let's see ya try something now bug!" Boomed the giant male Goblin. Speechless you didn't know what to do other than stare up at the giants with fear with not a clue what they would do to you. Noticing your fear Izzisal giggled, which echoed all throughout your ears as her giant sized made her quite loud. "Aww is tiny scared?" Izzisal teased as she lifted one of her MASSIVE feet in the air and hovered her toes above you. Falling to your knees as you stared into her sole, Izzisal smirked. "I dunno Jaxold" Izzisal spoke as she turned to her husband. "Maybe we could have some fun with him, he DID do me a favor earlier" "Is that right?" Jaxold, her husband replied. "In that case we won't crush you like the insect you are! But if you don't do as we say your gonna end up like a pancake got it!" Terrified you nodded, and Izzisal brought her foot back down.
"You can go back to work hubby he'll be a good boy to me!" Izzisal says you see Jaxold leave what finally you see as a giant bedroom.
You were now alone with Izzisal you just showed you mercy and ant sized to the Goblin giantess.
You may be scared for your life but even as you tremble before Izzisal you also remember your training as a rogue... To be observant... Knowing this Goblin just wants attention and power from her size advantage, sparing you and getting you to kiss her ass you decided to take a risk and approached her GIANT toe in front of you. "Did I say you could move insect!?" She booms as before she could act you dropped to your knees and smooched the huge green soft surface, causing Izzisal to go silent. "Aww so your being nice? Maybe, JUST MAYBE I won't crush you later after all" she giggles as you can tell she's liking it and as gross as it is, it's saving you so far.
Taking it a step further you gulped as you jumped as high as you could to barely reach her toe nail, and pulled yourself up. "Ohhh, very nice bug!" Issizal says admiring your climb. Dropping to your kneels you bow before her on her big toe nail while kissing it's hard green surface.
"Alright Alright!" Izzisal exclaims as she crosses her arms while staring down at your tiny body. "My show's on in a few minutes and since your behaving so well without being asked I guess I'll... let you play * while I kick back"
12313111.title: Bug sized before Goblins

choices: Try to please her! (Your actually liking her in control now)
123131112.content:
"Alright Alright!" Izzisal exclaims as she crosses her arms while staring down at your tiny body. "My show's on in a few minutes and since your behaving so well without being asked I guess I'll... let you play under my ass while I kick back" Izzisal says, leaving you speechless and not happy at all. All you mean't to do was please her enough so she doesn't crush you but now this!?
Looking back up to the HUGE Izzisal, she bends over with her hand open to grab you. "Hard to believe you were so cranky earlier but your not that bad! Now hold still so I don't break something your really fragile at that size!" Izzisal says as she slowly grabs your tiny body and carries you over to the giant pink couch in the room with a TV in front.
As Izzisal sits down with you in her arm, she moves her ass back and forth to get comfy and finally looks back at you. I guess I'll reward you for good behavior..." Izzisal speaks in an interesting tone eyeing your tiny body. "Wh... What reward?" You say stunned as Izzisal stands up and turns to face you. Eyeing you Izzisal giggles, turns around and pulls down her black leather pants and stuns you flashing the biggest booty you've ever seen inches from your face!
Although your pride feels threatened your jaw instantly drops and unexpectedly you get a boner! "Alright Bug like before..." Izzisal starts but gets very surprised to see you instantly smooch her titanic sized butt cheek without her even finishing. Feeling your smooch Izzisal laughs and slowly descends onto you. Once she sat down, you were now buried under her buttcheeks and face planted into her panties.
123131112.title: Under Izzisal's Ass

1231311121.content:
What you thought was cold being forced to kiss Izzisal's ass earlier to now being under almost her bare ass started to sink in with a different perspective. As you started liking your position you wiggled arms within the tight space free and reached out for the front part of her panties where you began wiggling for her. As you wiggled though thinking you were pleasing the giant Goblin you realized she most likely couldn't feel you anyways at your size. Might be the reason why she's allowing you under her ass as it seems your small enough to move around while avoiding being crushed you think.
Wiggling now to the front of her panties you rub as hard as you can hoping she notices and to your luck she does! "Oooh what's my little ant up to!?" Izzisal moans above as she shifts back to pull you into sight from under her ass. Looking up after stopping for a moment you see Izzisal's IMAX sized face smiling down to you. "I can't believe even at that fucking pathetic size I could feel ya, you must be strong!" Izzisal start, "Your being... too good of a boy why?" She says as she looks down at you.

info.brief_description: You get to choose your race and if you are an Alliance or Horde member.
info.description:
Everything is accepted, except death. Do not end the story, always make it that it's possible to continue the story from where you left it.

If your chapter is good, I might reward it with some extra gift points.

Once again: Anything is accepted. Shrinking, feet, anything.
